transport.question: I have wheels and pedals, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You might ride me to the park.
💪 You have to pedal to move me.
🚲 I usually have two wheels.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a specific path.
📣 I often have a whistle.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride me at once.

transport.question: I drive on roads, but I am much bigger than a car and carry many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I make frequent stops.
🏫 You might take me to school.
🗺️ I follow a specific route.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings, but I am not a bird.
🌎 I travel across countries and oceans.
💺 People sit inside me.

transport.question: I float on water and can carry lots of cargo or people across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I need water to move.
🌊 I am bigger than a canoe.
🚢 I might have a captain.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people who are sick or hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud noise when I am in a hurry.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑 I have a red cross on my side.

transport.question: I am very fast and go into space. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🚀 I have a powerful engine.
🌌 I travel far beyond Earth.

transport.question: I use sails to move across the water using the wind. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ The wind helps me move.
⛵ I have a large piece of cloth that catches the wind.
🌊 I am a type of boat.

transport.question: I have two wheels and a motor, and you have to wear a helmet when you ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle but smaller than a car.
🪖 Safety first!
⛽ I need gasoline to run.

transport.question: I travel underground in tunnels to avoid traffic. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I am a type of train.
🌃 I travel through cities very quickly.
🌍 You can find me in many major cities around the world.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and curved. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys find me a-peel-ing!
🟡 I grow on trees in tropical countries.
🌞 I'm a good source of potassium.

food.question: I am round and often red, but sometimes green or yellow. I grow on trees, and you can eat me whole or in slices. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White couldn't resist me.
🥧 I'm delicious in pies.
🩺 An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me, pour me on cereal, or make cheese with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I am often served cold.
🦴 I help make your bones strong.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack!
👀 I'm good for your eyesight.
🌱 I grow underground.

food.question: I'm a grain that is often cooked in water or broth. I can be short-grain or long-grain and I am a staple food for many cultures. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I'm a common side dish.
🌎 Many Asian dishes feature me.
🍣 You can find me in sushi.

food.question: I am made of flour, water and yeast. I am baked in an oven and come in many shapes and sizes. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 Many sandwiches use me.
🔥 I need heat to be made
🥖 I can be white, brown, or even sourdough.

food.question: I'm a dessert that's cold, sweet, and often flavored with vanilla, chocolate, or fruit. I am often eaten in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 A popular treat on a hot day.
🍨 I can be served in a bowl.
🥄 You usually eat me with a spoon.

food.question: I am made from cacao beans and can be sweet or bitter. I come in bars, chips, and powders. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 Many people love to eat me as a treat.
☕ I can be found in hot beverages.
🎂 I make some cakes and cookies taste even better!

food.question: I am a round, flat bread topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and other ingredients. I am baked in an oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often sliced into triangles.
🇮🇹 I am an Italian dish.
🚚 I am often delivered to your door.

food.question: I am a dish made by stirring uncooked grains of rice in a pot with broth, cheese, and often vegetables or meat until it reaches a creamy consistency. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am an Italian dish.
🥄 Requires constant stirring.
🍲 My name sounds like a type of food risk.
